main event: A resident in Sauk Centre, Minnesota reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object on September 11, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a blue glow and hovered at an estimated 500 feet above the ground., The sighting included a blinking light that appeared to disappear as the object moved at high altitude., Several witnesses were involved, including the reporter's son and a neighbor who were equally amazed., The sighting lasted approximately two minutes before the object shot straight up into the sky., The investigation suggested that the observed phenomena were characteristics commonly associated with aircraft.
sighted object: a round object with a blue glow
witness description: Sighting reports from residents, including individuals aged 43 and 65, who expressed concerns about ridicule regarding their experiences.
